capability.name: Fraud Diagnosis
capability.definition: This service domain handles the evaluation of detected possible fraud to support an appropriate response to contain the exposure
capability.role: Analyze suspect transaction with Customer behavior information across product portfolio, using Expert Systems/Artificial Intelligence and/or manual review, including customer contact to determine if transaction is fraudulent. Further apply Economic Model to determine transaction disposition and notify applicable Product Fulfillment SDs.
capability.example: Out of pattern card use is detected and the details passed for analysis. The analysis determines there is a high probability of fraud recommending appropriate containment actions

key_features.name: Analyse activity to assess likelihood of customer fraud
key_features.description: Enables analyse activity to assess likelihood of customer fraud to support this service domain handles the evaluation of detected possible fraud to support an appropriate response to contain the exposure

key_features.name: Analyse activity to assess likelihood of merchant fraud
key_features.description: Enables analyse activity to assess likelihood of merchant fraud to support this service domain handles the evaluation of detected possible fraud to support an appropriate response to contain the exposure
